product_design_flow.title: Discovery & Research
product_design_flow.description: Understand the business, users, and market context.
activities: Interview stakeholders to understand business vision, goals, constraints, and target audience
Conduct light user research (interviews, surveys, desk/competitive/heuristic analysis)
Create personas, journey maps, and initial problem hypotheses

product_design_flow.title: Problem Definition
product_design_flow.description: Translate findings into structured problem framing.
activities: Define clear problem statements
Identify opportunity areas
Establish hypothesis for solutions

product_design_flow.title: Structure & Scope
product_design_flow.description: Finalize user stories and structural foundation before UI exploration.
activities: Write and finalize user stories
Create information architecture (flows, hierarchies, screen maps)
Define functional requirements

product_design_flow.title: Design Exploration & Prototyping
activities: Explore solutions with low-fidelity concepts and wireframes
Iterate toward mid- and high-fidelity prototypes
Ensure accessibility and consistency with design system

product_design_flow.title: Feedback & Validation
product_design_flow.description: Validate solutions with both business stakeholders and end users.
activities: Present concepts to clients/stakeholders with design rationale
Conduct usability testing with users (3–8 participants)
Validate business alignment and user usability

product_design_flow.title: Iteration & Refinement
product_design_flow.description: Refine designs based on collected feedback.
activities: Apply feedback from both clients and users
Prioritize critical issues for business and usability impact
Polish flows, visuals, and interactions

product_design_flow.title: Delivery & Handoff
product_design_flow.description: Prepare design assets and collaborate with development.
activities: Prepare annotated design files and style guides
Provide design system components/specs
Collaborate with developers during build
Support QA design reviews

product_design_flow.title: Post-Launch Evaluation
product_design_flow.description: Measure success and feed improvements back into the loop.
activities: Monitor analytics (funnels, retention, NPS, support tickets)
Collect post-launch user and client feedback
Plan improvements and loop back to Problem Definition

projects.title: Multiverse UI
projects.summary: Design system powering multiple web apps; shipped tokens and component library.
projects.detailedText: Led systemization of primitives → tokens → components. Introduced audit → propose → pilot → roll-out loop; cut UI defects and handoff churn.
